detailed_reviews.review_text: Brought my Ferrari in for a safety inspection.  I imported it from Ontario...so it needs the BC safety inspection before it can be registered and licensed in BC. These folks were so accommodating with time frames to get me in when my car arrived in Vancouver. Very friendly on the phone and in person. But the thing that put this shop over the top was when they did with my car when it was ready for pick up. See the photo. I mean how incredibly thoughtful... Parking my pride and joy way off in the  corner in a dedicated double spot so there is was chance or an errant door ding from a car parked next door, or an unmanned runaway shopping cart! Thanks to the folks at Can Tire for the thoughtful gesture.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello there, Ive shared this with the team, and everyone was thrilled to see your appreciation for detail! We take pride in taking care of all our customers cars, and your beauty was definitely no exception. Im glad we were able to accommodate a time for you, and greatly appreciate the feedback and 5 star review. Enjoy the roads! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

detailed_reviews.review_text: I called in the afternoon of the 18th with an urgent issue and Genesis was able to fit me in with Robbie, the shop foreman. He was able to diagnose and repair the issue last minute. Im so grateful for the help, absolutely above and beyond service at this location. Thank you guys so much for helping me out, I appreciate it more than you could know. Anxiety attack avoided! Thank you so much!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Elicia, Thank you so much for the positive feedback! Both Genesis and Rob were thrilled to see they were able to make a difference. I would also like to thank you for taking the time to transfer your review over to our Service Center! Your business is truly appreciated, and we hope you have a wonderful holiday season. Stay warm, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

detailed_reviews.review_text: Genesis, Daniel, and PJ. These guys are AWESOME. I was truly blown away with how helpful, kind, and professional these guys are. They worked extremely hard and late on a Sunday evening to make sure my car was safe and ready for my day of work the next morning. Great guys. Great mechanics. Great experience. Definitely will continue to use Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre. -Liam
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello there, I thank you for taking the time to write out this wonderful review. These guys work hard to make sure everyone leaves satisfied. Your feedback and business are truly appreciated. Have a great day! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service Center 604-707-2291

detailed_reviews.review_text: Genesis in the auto department is freaking awesome, went above and beyond to help me. I had visited this location originally looking to purchase a single tire, I was given a stellar deal on 4 clearance tires and the staff were able to install them that same afternoon. This helped me so much, probably the best shopping experience Ive ever had Services: Tires , Wheel alignment
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello James, We thank you for your kind words. Genesis was very pleased to see your review and know his efforts did not go unnoticed! Im glad we were able to get you back on the road quickly and we look forward to helping you with any future repairs you may need. Have a great holiday season! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

detailed_reviews.review_text: Alex, John, and Mark were great at helping me out!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Samuel, Thank you for your positive feedback. Its great to hear that Alex, John, and Mark were able to assist you effectively. Our team always aims to provide the best service, and its heartening to see it recognized. We look forward to serving you again in the future. Warm regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

name: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre
address: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre, 2830 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4

detailed_reviews.review_text: I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it. Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned. I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you dont need as many other shops that try to sell you things you dont need. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle. Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service. As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like: Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi G Brenes, Im happy to hear that the Auto Service Team has provided you with such great service over the years and Ill be sure to recognize both Tao and Peter for the extra effort during your recent winter tire purchase. Its great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit. - Chris, General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee  Mei Lin  was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Richard! We will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforsts. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you cant go wrong here. Its not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days. Service: Tires
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sebastian! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: Talk about above-and-beyond service! Servive Advisor Bill Clarke went out of his way to help me keep my car running, gave realistic advice to determining the priority and schedule proceed. Im also thrilled at the work your mechanics were able to provide. Ill be recommending your service centre to anyone with a vehicle, and you and Bill have secured tjis location a customer for life.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Erika! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: After having a negative experience at the Canadian Tire Auto Centre in North Van on Saturday, the Grandview location has restored my faith in the brand. Stanley was extremely helpful over the phone and I was able to get my car looked at within half an hour of calling. They took my car in right before closing and managed to patch my tire all within about 2 hours of the first phone call (over Easter weekend as well). Any time I have needed work done quickly without breaking the bank, this location has always been wonderful to deal with.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sammie, Thanks for taking the time to provide us with this feedback. Im pleased to hear Stanley was helpful and able to get your vehicle into the shop quickly. Were lucky to have experienced advisors like Stanley on our team. Well see you next time you! Tao, Auto Service Centre

detailed_reviews.review_text: Stopped in last min to get some help with some missing lug nuts we discovered after my car started making a horrible sound. Everyone was so lovely and went the extra mile to help us out. The thing that really stood out was just the genuine care and even great conversation!! You have some wonderful, kind hearted people on your team working there! Kudos you rescued us and made our night!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Lauren! We really appreciate the 5 stars and are happy to be able to help you out. Our Auto team will be pleased to know that their efforts were appreciated. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Amanda, Auto Centre Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently bought a second hand Subaru and brought it to Canadian Tire for inspection and service. Whatever it is you need the man to see is Bill Clarke. Bill was professional, efficient and most of all personable when helping me. He took time to explain what service diagnosis was for the car and brought me to the floor to review. Also, he gave, what seemed to me,  honest advice about when certain maintenance did / did not need to be done. Bill Clarke is the man, see him for help with auto related items. Thanks for your help!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing this experience, Jared. We are very fortunate to have team members like Bill who strive to provide a 5-star experience to our customers. Ill be sure to recognize Bill for a job well done. Enjoy your new ride! Chris, General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I store my winter tires with this location, and had the check engine light come on just before I was going to get my tires swapped over for the spring. I decided to get the whole car checked over and oil changed, etc. They provide the work order of everything that needed some work and advised what needed to be done immediately vs what could be put off which I really appreciated. I ll definitely be going back for more honest work/repairs.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Dan! Im happy to hear you appreciate us outlining the recommended and suggested work for your vehicle on the work order. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Highly qualified and knowledgeable staff. Immediately knew what to do with my complex case of international import. Adjusted appointment and helped immediately.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving a 5-star rating, Varun! We appreciate your support and are glad you had a positive experience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very good
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: A go to place for all my vehicle needs... friendly service and the best price Ive seeen for tire storage!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Im happy we were able to help you with your tire storage needs and glad to hear we are your preferred shop. See you next time! - Tao, Auto Service Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is the store closest to me. I used to go to rmd to find a Chinese-speaking staff. I am very happy that now this store has Chinese-speaking staff in order to enhance its service. Amada enthusiastically helped me, so that my business such as car inspection and tire replacement can go smoothly. Not bad
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our shop and provide this feedback Ramona. Im delighted to hear that Amanda was helpful with your inspection and tire change. We are lucky to have Amanda on our team. We hope to see you again soon. Chris, General Manager
